title: How to Make the Wraith in Soul Calibur IV

steps.headline: Beat arcade mode a few times, this will hopefully unlock the Monk's garb, Usurpers suit, Executioner's boots, Leather gloves, Death's cloak or Hermit's Hood ,Hannya Mask, and Zasalamel Fighting style (The one with the scythe)
After unlocking these items, go into Create a Soul and start a new character, set the following for beginning: Male: Zasalamei

For the further things, use the following: Equipment trait|None (Light works too)| Battle Trait: Attack focus | Alignment: None | From there, select "Start editing this character" and take off all clothes/Start from scrap.
First of all, go to the "Model Information" tab and go to skin color.
steps.description: Select "9.15.14" for skin color (First digit [9] is adjusted by the bumpers for those who can't figure it out), "Male Voice 5 Pitch: -50" for voice (Hair and face don't matter much, as head armor is very difficult to remove during battle), And "9.02.15" for eye color. Remember the eye color, as that matters for later wardrobe

steps.headline: Go back to your characters attire and select "Death's Cloak" or "Hermit's Hood" for face equipment, leave the color as it is, we'll come to that later.
Go onto the face and select "Hannya Mask", as with the head equipment, leave the color as it is.
Shoulders are optional If you want to make the shoulders look broader, but not completely necessary.
steps.description: Pick some spaulders and leave them as is.

steps.headline: As for undergarments, get the "Usurper's Suit", it makes the body look better because of the opening in it.
For the body select the "Monk's Garb".
steps.description: I'll tell you now, leave everything as it is on all equipment.

steps.headline: the lower body armor can't be selected, but lucky for you, the "Usurper's Suit" covers that, so its all good!
For the feet, "Executioner's Boots" are the best.
Now that you've got all the equipment, and your character is looking pretty crappy, go to the colors and select the first option (Change all colors) and set it to "9.02.15" just as the eyes were.
He's probably looking a bit better, am I right?
steps.description: well to make him look a WHOLE lot better, edit the mask and make the whole mask white and make the first part black (for the shadow or leave it red to blend in with the hood, Though I prefer black), and the horns yellow, choose whatever shade of yellow you desire. This will make the Wraith start to look better.

steps.headline: To finish him to look how he should, make the leather gloves yellow, same color as the horns preferably.

Now, up close he won't look much like him, but hey, it only zooms in on his face when you: Select him, Defeat an opponent, Edit him, Lose to an opponent, and do a critical finish, So no big deal, from far away it'll look like he has no face (Which he doesn't on the album) and like he has horns from his hood.
Lastly, there Is the weapons and System (Information).
steps.description: for the name, its obviously going to be the Wraith, Wraith, etc.
